entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 65 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
